text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer You could've done that by passing the bill funding coronavirus defense, care, & support when the bill was ready instead of playing political games & waiting until after the Tuesday election. You are disgusting in your faux outrage oh his  actions. Trump's way ahead of you.
